Package hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.algorithm.arg

Class ArgTrace<S extends State,A extends Action>

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.algorithm.arg.ArgTrace<S,A>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<ArgNode<S,A>>
public final class ArgTrace<S extends State,A extends Action> extends Object implements Iterable<ArgNode<S,A>>
Represents a trace in the ARG, which is an alternating list of ArgNodes and ArgEdges.
